name: Push Puzzle Pets
description:
Don't miss our other games:

Candy Challenge

Dirt Race

Animal Jigsaw Puzzle
Beat the Bead
Dice War Reloaded
Rocket Dream
Touch Twins
Devil on the Run

Gibbon Labs presents:
Push Puzzle Pets!

Meet the 10 cuddly and fluffy
little pets in a traditional
Push Puzzle game.

The different animal pictures
just wait for you to move all
of the pieces to the right place.

The game has a very easy and
intuitive gameplay and is suitable
for all age groups.
